amendment.description: To grant a Federal charter to Korean War Veterans Association, Incorporated.

vote.text: Amendment SA 3296 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Amendment SA 3296 proposed by Senator Levin for Senator Sarbanes. (consideration: CR S6718-6719; text: CR S6718-6719) To grant a Federal charter to Korean War Veterans Association, Incorporated.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 3296 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 3296 proposed by Senator Levin for Senator Sarbanes.
